body:
The following commit fixes the following issues with py-gpaw package:
1. py-numpy's include directory was not set correctly in the original package.
2. Older version of gpaw had a call to a function in libxc that is no longer present. The patch fixes this. See [this issue](https://gitlab.com/gpaw/gpaw/merge_requests/267) for more information. 

In addition the newest version of py-gpaw is added.
title: py-gpaw: Fixing missing numpy include path, adding newer version of p…
